Positions.Description:
User Experience Researcher
City of Fort Lauderdale Government - part-time remote project for COVID-19 relief initiatives

operating within Sunshine laws and regulations.

User Experience Researcher
Life Nome by Wellness Traits, New York, NY, December 2020 - expected completion second week of September 2020
• Passion project leading foundational research, establishing UX metrics and strategy from the ground up for a
brand new wellness company.

Led the charge in planning and executing discovery UX research for FactSet's enterprise products with an
international client base.
• Led discussions with an international team of product development to prioritize product design problems.
• Identify and describe user issues, pain points, and future must-haves.
• Translate research insights into concrete feature insights, initiatives, successful product designs, and strategies.
• Evangelize user research throughout the organization.

• Design and conduct end-to-end user research studies on shared products.
• Analyze, describe, and promote research findings to product teams and senior executive stakeholders.
• Ensure UX Research insights have an impact on product strategy and development by workshopping with teams to collectively determine actions to address each issue or insight uncovered by research.
• Advocate for the value of UX research throughout the organization.

Design and conduct research using a wide variety of qualitative methods and a subset of quantitative methods,
such as surveys, user and stakeholder interviews, expert reviews guided by data and analytics. Adopt appropriate
user research methods, approaches to translating research insights into successful product strategy.

ResumeMetadata.PlainText:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
Detail-oriented, diligent professional with strong communication skills, technological background, and applied
research and project management training. Passionate about understanding users and uncovering their reality,
identifying root-causes, and problem-solving. Eager to empower teams to make informed, empathy-driven decisions
that lead to innovative, usable, and solution-oriented products. Dedicated to collaborative work.
In my work, I have uncovered business needs, developed strategies, methodologies, recruited participants, organized
research processes, analyzed research findings for stakeholders, and promoted actionable research results.
Experienced in planning and leading exploratory, concept, and usability studies. Trained in focus group facilitation
and ethnographic research.

SKILLS AND METHODS
Concept Prototype Testing	Card Sorting/IA	Interviewing/IDis	Contextual Inquiry
Usability	Creating Personas	  Consumer/User Journeys	A/B Testing
Heuristics Analysis	  Collective Use Mapping	Jobs-to-be-done	Multivariate Testing
Focus Groups	Ethnography	  Workshopping	  Feature Analysis
Quantitative Data Analysis	 Insights Generation	Reports/Discussion Guides	 Survey Programming
EXPERIENCE
User Experience Researcher
City of Fort Lauderdale Government - part-time remote project for COVID-19 relief initiatives
• Leading discovery and evaluative research on virtual meeting practices and policies for a government office
operating within Sunshine laws and regulations.

User Experience Researcher
Life Nome by Wellness Traits, New York, NY, December 2020 - expected completion second week of September 2020
• Passion project leading foundational research, establishing UX metrics and strategy from the ground up for a
brand new wellness company.
Senior User Experience Researcher
FactSet, New York, New York, NY, November 2018 - December 2019
• Led the charge in planning and executing discovery UX research for FactSet's enterprise products with an
international client base.
• Led discussions with an international team of product development to prioritize product design problems.
• Identify and describe user issues, pain points, and future must-haves.
• Translate research insights into concrete feature insights, initiatives, successful product designs, and strategies.
• Evangelize user research throughout the organization.
User Experience Researcher
User Experience Innovation Lab at ADP, New York, NY, June 2017 - September 2018
• Design and conduct end-to-end user research studies on shared products.
• Analyze, describe, and promote research findings to product teams and senior executive stakeholders.
• Ensure UX Research insights have an impact on product strategy and development by workshopping with teams to
collectively determine actions to address each issue or insight uncovered by research.
• Advocate for the value of UX research throughout the organization.
UX Researcher, UX Strategist
ServiceLab, New York, NY, September 2015 - May 2017
• Design and conduct research using a wide variety of qualitative methods and a subset of quantitative methods,
such as surveys, user and stakeholder interviews, expert reviews guided by data and analytics. Adopt appropriate
user research methods, approaches to translating research insights into successful product strategy.
RECENT EDUCATION

UX Research for Business Innovation - Mini-MBA for Applied Social Scientists, December 20, 2017.
UX Research, Lean User Experience Strategy - Ethnographic Praxis, 2016, 2017.
Human-Computer Interaction, Service Design, Focus Groups Moderation - University of Washington, Seattle, 2012.
ADDITIONAL EXPERIENCE
Project Management and Test Development, Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, WA
Managed development and coordination of key components in new Windows feature applications throughout the
entire project lifecycle; managed project team members; created specifications for new products using data from
market analysis; instigated and coordinated usability studies and focus groups; presented results of these studies.
FORMAL EDUCATION
MS - Information Science, University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill
MS, BS - Applied Anthropology, Moscow University, Moscow, Russia
PROFESSIONAL ASSOCIATIONS
